question: At a party, you would rather:

options.text: Meet new people and have deep conversations
Spend time with close friends in a quiet corner
Organize activities and make sure everyone has fun
Observe the crowd and people-watch

Feel drained and need time to recharge
Enjoy the interaction but need breaks

Think before speaking and choose words carefully

options.text: Go out with friends or family
Stay home and relax quietly

Spend time alone to recharge

question: In a conflict, you prefer to:

options.text: Focus on the facts and logical arguments

Consider how the person will receive the feedback

options.text: Logical fit with your skills and interests

question: In a team project, you focus on:
